main event: A round, reddish-orange object, approximately 3 feet in diameter, with a steaming tail of gaseous flame was observed 60 miles east of Puerto Rico.
interesting points: The object was seen during a 5-minute observation period by crew members aboard a Dutch merchant vessel., The sighting involved one object which made a gradual right turn before disappearing over the horizon., No sound was detected from the object during the sighting., The object was observed using binoculars by multiple witnesses., There are indications that the object may have missile-like characteristics.
sighted object: one round, reddish-orange object with a steaming tail
witness description: crewmen aboard the Dutch merchant vessel Collyto
